pages.text: An altered state of mind in which the patient undergoes heightened senses, shifting colours, and general delirium. This state can be induced through chemicals, stress, or other overwhelming sensations and experiences.$(br)Unlike other conditions, this ailment cannot be subsided with milk.
The patient must either let it run its course, or consume our patented $(l:miskatonicmysteries:tranquilizers)$(item)Tranquilizers$().
